name: The Touchscreen is going Haywire
description:
Fight against your cursor. While you play, the clickable area will move, morph, and rotate. Try to find the exact spot that you need to click!

- Notes -

  • Made for the GameMaker's Toolkit 2020 game jam.
  • View instructions while playing by pressing tab
  • There is no in-game way to exit the game. You will have to close it manually

- Extra -

  • The windows are out of control?
  • I was the only person working on this
  • I focused mostly on the coding, that's why there is no audio and the art is pretty bad
  • I used Unreal Engine 4, blueprint scripting.
  • Solving coding bugs is hard
